comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

I visited a website which was protected by two password layouts. (htaccess style).


Actual results:

I got prompted to enter my login informations, but, after entering the first one, I couldn't click the "remember password" that pops up, as the other password prompt appeared too fast.


Expected results:

I could've clicked the "remember password" button as I was completing the second prompt.
